situation: N felt reluctant to engage with classmates during paired storytelling activities due to speech challenges.
action: The teacher aide encouraged N by pairing her with a classmate who was patient and supportive. They also integrated visual storytelling methods to assist N in expressing her thoughts.
effect: N became more comfortable participating in storytelling activities. The supportive pairing and alternative communication strategy alleviated her anxiety, leading to meaningful social interaction and a greater sense of inclusion.
topic: Social Interaction Challenges - Difficulties with peer interactions, challanges during
